Package thothbot.parallax.core.client.context

Canvas in 3D context and all related code.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Context3dLostHandler Handler interface for Context3dLostEvent events.
 

Class Summary
Canvas3d A canvas with WebGL support.
Canvas3dAttributes Canvas3dAttributes interface contains drawing surface attributes and is passed as the second parameter to getContext.
Context3dLostEvent Represents a native webgl context lost event.
 

Exception Summary
Canvas3dException Represents an exception from the Canvas3d.
 

Package thothbot.parallax.core.client.context Description

Canvas in 3D context and all related code.
